Submodules¶

ng20_lda.lda module¶

ng20_lda.lda.describe_document(text: str, lda: LatentDirichletAllocation, vectorizer: CountVectorizer, top_k_topics: int = 3, top_k_words: int = 5) → Dict[int, list[str]][source]¶

Describe a document with its most relevant topics and top words per topic.

Paramètres:

  • text – Document content.

  • lda – Trained LDA model.

  • vectorizer – Fitted CountVectorizer.

  • top_k_topics – Number of topics to show.

  • top_k_words – Number of words to show per topic.

Renvoie:

Dict mapping topic_id -> list of top words.

ng20_lda.lda.iter_txt_files(root_dir: Path) → List[Path][source]¶

Recursively list all .txt files under a directory.

Paramètres:

root_dir – Root directory to search.

Renvoie:

List of .txt file paths (sorted for reproducibility).

ng20_lda.lda.load_lda_bundle(pickle_path: Path)[source]¶

Load a saved LDA bundle (lda + vectorizer) from pickle.

ng20_lda.lda.load_texts(files: List[Path]) → List[str][source]¶

Load multiple text files as UTF-8.

Paramètres:

files – List of file paths.

Renvoie:

List of text contents.

ng20_lda.lda.save_lda_bundle(model_dir: Path, lda: LatentDirichletAllocation, vectorizer: CountVectorizer) → Path[source]¶

Save LDA + vectorizer into a pickle file inside model_dir.

Paramètres:

  • model_dir – Output directory for the model.

  • lda – Trained LDA model.

  • vectorizer – Fitted CountVectorizer.

Renvoie:

Path to the created pickle file.

ng20_lda.lda.train_lda_from_dir(texts_dir: Path, n_topics: int = 10, max_features: int = 2000, random_state: int = 0) → Tuple[LatentDirichletAllocation, CountVectorizer][source]¶

Train an LDA model from all txt files found recursively in a folder.

Paramètres:

  • texts_dir – Directory containing .txt files (recursively).

  • n_topics – Number of topics for LDA.

  • max_features – Vocabulary size limit for CountVectorizer.

  • random_state – Random seed.

Renvoie:

(lda_model, vectorizer)

ng20_lda.lines module¶

ng20_lda.lines.count_lines_from_path(path: Path) → int[source]¶

Count the number of lines in a UTF-8 text file.

Paramètres:

path – Path to the file.

Renvoie:

Number of lines in the file.

ng20_lda.lines.count_lines_from_text(text: str) → int[source]¶

Count the number of lines in a text.

A line is separated by “n”.

Paramètres:

text – Input text.

Renvoie:

Number of lines.

Exemples

>>> count_lines_from_text("a\nb\n")
2
>>> count_lines_from_text("")
0
>>> count_lines_from_text("one line")
1

ng20_lda.logging_utils module¶

ng20_lda.logging_utils.setup_logging(level: str = 'INFO') → None[source]¶

Configure basic logging for the CLI.

Paramètres:

level – Logging level (e.g., « DEBUG », « INFO », « WARNING »).

ng20_lda.ng20 module¶

ng20_lda.ng20.export_ng20_category(category: str, n_docs: int, output_dir: Path) → Path[source]¶

Export the first N documents of a 20 Newsgroups category into txt files.

It creates the folder: output_dir/category and writes files: 0.txt, 1.txt, …, (n_docs-1).txt

Paramètres:

  • category – A 20 Newsgroups category name (e.g., « sci.space »).

  • n_docs – Number of documents to export (first N documents).

  • output_dir – Output base directory.

Renvoie:

The created category directory path (output_dir/category).

Lève:

ValueError – If n_docs <= 0 or category is empty.
